trans-unit.source: Represents a transaction to be performed at a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.
The <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> interface allows an inheriting class to implement a Transaction class, which represents the transaction to be performed at a data source.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> interfaccia consente a una classe che eredita di implementare una classe di transazione, che rappresenta la transazione deve essere eseguita in un'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Transaction classes, see [Transactions and Concurrency](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/transactions-and-concurrency.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle classi di transazione, vedere [transazioni e concorrenza](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/transactions-and-concurrency.md).

trans-unit.source: An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione crea un'istanza di <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> interfaccia direttamente, ma crea un'istanza di una classe che eredita <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che ereditano <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> deve implementare i membri ereditati e in genere definire membri aggiuntivi per aggiungere funzionalità specifiche del provider.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> interface defines the <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction> interfaccia definisce il <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction> class inherits this property, and also defines the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A sua volta, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction> classe questa proprietà viene ereditata e definisce anche la <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Begin%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates instances of the derived classes, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente crea istanze di classi derivate, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form <paramref name="Prv" /> Transaction where <paramref name="Prv" /> is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace.
trans-unit.target: Per promuovere la coerenza fra i provider di dati .NET Framework, assegnare un nome alla classe che eredita il form <paramref name="Prv" /> transazione in cui <paramref name="Prv" /> è il prefisso uniforme assegnato a tutte le classi in uno specifico spazio dei nomi provider di dati .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="Sql" /> is the prefix of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction" /> class in the <see langword="System.Data.SqlClient" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, <paramref name="Sql" /> è il prefisso del <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction" /> classe il <see langword="System.Data.SqlClient" /> dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: Commits the database transaction.
The following example creates instances of the derived classes, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente crea istanze di classi derivate, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or-
The connection is broken.
Specifies the Connection object to associate with the transaction.
The Connection object to associate with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto Connection da associare alla transazione.

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: Una singola applicazione può avere più connessioni di database, ciascuna con zero o più transazioni.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di determinare l'oggetto connessione associato a una particolare transazione.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> per questa transazione.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="ReadCommitted" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="ReadCommitted" />.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Le transazioni parallele non sono supportate.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> applies to the entire transaction.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> si applica all'intera transazione.

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: Può solo essere il rollback della transazione da uno stato in sospeso (dopo <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> è stato chiamato, ma prima <xref:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Commit%2A> viene chiamato).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates instances of the derived classes, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente crea istanze di classi derivate, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or-
The connection is broken.
When overriding <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Rollback" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see langword="Rollback" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbTransaction.Rollback" /> in una classe derivata, assicurarsi di chiamare la classe base <see langword="Rollback" /> metodo.
